title: Microsoft Purview | Information protection: Co-authoring on encrypted documents on Mobile
description:
Multiple authors can edit labeled and protected documents in Word, Excel, and PowerPoint simultaneously, frictionless, and with auto-save, as if they were regular documents.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/compliance/sensitivity-labels-coauthoring?view=o365-worldwide
GA date: August CY2022
